Is there any significance to the composition of generation zero beyond 
tha=
t of providing a radomized evaluation/starting point of the design 
space? =
If the composition is a set of random points in the design 
space, is one p=
opulation/set of random starting points any different 
than any other, exce=
pt for perhaps getting lucky in regards to a higher 
fitness potential via =
complexification?

The function of the NEAT params are focused on transitio=
n to subsequent 
generations, and as such appear neutral wrt generation zer=
o, except for 
perhaps population size.

If this is the case, is there any =
loss of generality by generating 
multiple populations of generation zero, =
and cherry-picking the best as 
the population to proceed with NEAT evoluti=
on?
